title: GO SMS Pro Blue Smoke Theme
creator: Themes Architect

extendedInfo.description: Application to send SMS messages with motive of smoke on the blue background. Text in main menu is in white color. Background of SMS popup is transparent blue. We have create icons with blue and white elements. SMS Background window have shades of blue, contains white text, icons and other elements of the color white with blue smoke motif. A beautiful wallpaper of blue smoke quickly beautify your phone. The smoke is the result of combustion, each associated with fire, fire and smoke. It is also a symbol of smoking weed or marijuana when you are rastaman. This theme will be great for ganja smokers. Each person who likes cigarettes and joint will be satisfied with this theme. Requirements:This theme requires GO SMS Pro application installed on your phone. You can download it for free from Google Play typing GO SMS Pro in search field.This theme contains:- smoke background- well matched colors may be helpful when typing sms messages- changed contact list, message compose and popup window. How to run our theme:1. Download our GO SMS Pro Smoke Theme for free2. Open GO SMS Pro application and press MENU button.3. Choose our Smoke Theme theme and click applyHow to change theme appearance:1. Open GO SMS Pro application and press Menu button.2. Choose Settings.3. From settings tab select Advanced tab.4. Press Appearance Settings5. Set any option of our theme. You can set there:- Conversation List appearance- Conversation appearance- Popup window appearance- Text Font- Reset to default settings.Support - Themes ArchitectIf you need help with our theme please contact with us on email:  themesarchitect@gmail.comOur support works only in the English language. Please contact us in this language because we will solve your problem easier.Comments and rating:If you want to help other users find our theme please leave comment and positive rating.Before posting negative opinion please contact us. We can solve your issue in most cases and you will be happy using our theme without problems.Advertising:This free application is ads supported. Ads may show in notification tray and / or your smartphone home screen. Permissions are for ads.Other themes from Themes ArchitectFull list of our themes is available by clicking our developer name on Google Play.Check our other  GO Launcher EX, GO SMS Pro and GO Locker free themes. Themes are released regularly so you can find something new every time.Compatibility:Our themes has been tested on the most common smartphone-s offered by manufacturers such as: Samsung, HTC, LG, Sony and Motorola. Our themes works with Android 2.2 and later.

reviews.title: Nice theme
